titles: The Loyalty and glory of the city of Bath being a true and perfect relation of the wonderful ceremony, and transactions, that were lately performed there.
publisher: Printed by A. Milbourn, and are to be sold at his house ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Concerns the coronation of William and Mary.
